content.raw:
Sadly, when I use this code, I get to "GAZEBO_GUI_INI_PATH of ["fdsjakfds"] does not exist. No gui.ini will be loaded.\n" and then gzclient crashes with the following error:

gzclient: /usr/include/boost/smart_ptr/shared_ptr.hpp:653: typename boost::detail::sp_member_access<T>::type boost::shared_ptr<T>::operator->() const [with T = gazebo::transport::Connection; typename boost::detail::sp_member_access<T>::type = gazebo::transport::Connection*]: Assertion `px != 0' failed.

From gui::run, it looks like the Gazebo gui isn't supposed to load if gui::load returns false, which is currently what happens if the file is not found.
content.html:
Sadly, when I use this code, I get to "GAZEBO_GUI_INI_PATH of ["fdsjakfds"] does not exist. No gui.ini will be loaded.\n" and then gzclient crashes with the following error:

gzclient: /usr/include/boost/smart_ptr/shared_ptr.hpp:653: typename boost::detail::sp_member_access<T>::type boost::shared_ptr<T>::operator->() const [with T = gazebo::transport::Connection; typename boost::detail::sp_member_access<T>::type = gazebo::transport::Connection*]: Assertion `px != 0' failed.

From gui::run, it looks like the Gazebo gui isn't supposed to load if gui::load returns false, which is currently what happens if the file is not found.
